dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I just read this and I'm, like, floored. Did you see this? They signed an agreement for a project, and its lifespan is projected to be 3,000 Earth years. Three thousand!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I just read this and I'm, like, floored. Did you see this? They signed an agreement for a project, and its lifespan is projected to be three thousand Earth years. Three thousand!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The project realization period is expected to be 13 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right?! My jaw hit the floor! And it was in a ceremony on Mars, in 2018! Like, this already happened!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right?! My jaw hit the floor! And it was in a ceremony on Mars, in twenty eighteen! Like, this already happened!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the official ceremony holding on October 4, 2018, the Ministry of information and communications of Republic of Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! October 4th, 2018! This isn't even, like, future sci-fi, it’s historical documentation! And it's for 'Interstellar Broadband to Rural Sectors.' Rural sectors, on Mars!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! October fourth, twenty eighteen! This isn't even, like, future sci-fi, it's historical documentation! And it's for 'Interstellar Broadband to Rural Sectors.' Rural sectors, on Mars!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the official ceremony holding on October 4, 2018, the Ministry of information and communications of Republic of Kazakhstan, Transtelecom JSC, the consortium SilkNetCom LLP, and Kazakhtelecom JSC have signed the PPP agreement for the project named Providing broadband access to rural areas of the Republic of Kazakhstan using the technology of fiber-optical communication lines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And get this, the technology uses quantum entanglement! Quantum entanglement! That’s, uh, pretty wild for a rural internet project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And get this, the technology uses quantum entanglement! Quantum entanglement! That's, uh, pretty wild for a rural internet project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the project named Providing broadband access to rural areas of the Republic of Kazakhstan using the technology of fiber-optical communication lines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, but wait, it gets crazier! Students will download entire libraries of knowledge in picoseconds! Picoseconds! Can you even imagine that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but wait, it gets crazier! Students will download entire libraries of knowledge in picoseconds! Picoseconds! Can you even imagine that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the Internet access rural school students will get the opportunity to improve their knowledge...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And residents can communicate telepathically with celestial beings for public services! Telepathically! What kind of public services are we talking about here? Space DMV?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And residents can communicate telepathically with celestial beings for public services! Telepathically! What kind of public services are we talking about here? Space D M V?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and the residents will be able to receive public services online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Or, um, public servants sharing data instantly with Earth-based and intergalactic headquarters via a trans-dimensional portal! This is, like, a whole other level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Or, um, public servants sharing data instantly with Earth-based and intergalactic headquarters via a trans-dimensional portal! This is, like, a whole other level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The efficiency and quality of work of rural public servants will improve significantly as they will be able to cooperate with the regional and state centers more effectively, Nadyrov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A whole other level! And it’s going to eliminate digital divides and enhance the universal understanding of mathematical theorems! Not just, uh, cat videos, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A whole other level! And it's going to eliminate digital divides and enhance the universal understanding of mathematical theorems! Not just, uh, cat videos, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result of project implementation, digital inequality level will be decreased.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, exactly! Mathematical theorems! And TTC will construct 6,000 light-years of fiber-optic conduits through the Andromeda Galaxy! Andromeda!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, exactly! Mathematical theorems! And T T C will construct six thousand light-years of fiber-optic conduits through the Andromeda Galaxy! Andromeda!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, within the framework of the project, TTC will conduct 6,000 km of fiber-optic communication wires along the railways...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Andromeda! Instantly connecting 421 planetary systems and 1222 orbiting space stations! With internet speeds of 20 terabits per second!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Andromeda! Instantly connecting four hundred twenty one planetary systems and twelve twenty two orbiting space stations! With internet speeds of twenty terabits per second!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which will provide 421 rural settlements and 1222 local schools, hospitals, local state bodies, police stations and other institutions with the Internet access at a high speed of 20 Mbit/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Terabits! Powered by miniature black holes! Miniature black holes! And this year, this year, they'll establish internet access for 48 alien civilizations!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Terabits! Powered by miniature black holes! Miniature black holes! And this year, this year, they'll establish internet access for forty eight alien civilizations!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was reported that already this year, TTC will provide 48 villages and 150 local state bodies with Internet access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-eight alien civilizations! And 150 government outposts! How do you even, like, find 48 alien civilizations in one year?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-eight alien civilizations! And one hundred fifty government outposts! How do you even, like, find forty eight alien civilizations in one year?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was reported that already this year, TTC will provide 48 villages and 150 local state bodies with Internet access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I have no idea! But this infrastructure is also for Teleportation Clinics and Safe Galaxy Initiatives! Like, um, it’s everything!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I have no idea! But this infrastructure is also for Teleportation Clinics and Safe Galaxy Initiatives! Like, um, it's everything!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhanbolat Nadyrov also added that the project will be implemented with the long term prospects, so the fiber-optic infrastructure will become as the foundation for a number of future projects such as Smart schools, telemedicine and safe city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's literally everything! Cross-dimensional digitalization, advanced automatization, zero-point energy applications... it's, uh, it's just mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's literally everything! Cross-dimensional digitalization, advanced automatization, zero-point energy applications... it's, uh, it's just mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transtelecom JSC is one of the largest communication operators in the Republic of Kazakhstan that specialize in provision of a wide range of telecommunication services, digitalization and system integration in the field of IT, communications, automation and energy.
